channel.title: Posts on Website of Chris König
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Website of Chris König

item.title: Switching from pc to mac
item.description: I’m a developer in the Microsoft ecosystem but I prefer Apple hardware, and since Microsoft introduced .NET 5 it is easy to work on your project using a mac. This post shall describe you my experience regarding the switch from pc to mac, while the rest of the development team is working with a pc.

item.title: Part 2 Logging: Correlation-ID with ASP.NET Core WebApi and NLog
item.description: A correlation ID is mostly the same like an transaction-id in the SQL World. I use it for logging and error analysis. Whithout a correlation id you are totaly lost in your log!
